alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:37AM CST until January 26 at 2:07PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. For the Saline River...including Benton, Rye...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River at Benton. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Pastures along west bank will flood. There may be some low lying county roads near the river flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 21.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Saline River Benton 18.0 14.2 Tue 8 am CST 21.5 16.9 8.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 945 AM CST.
